help:
This application installs the selected GNU/Linux distribution and runs in a container.
Steps for usage: 1. Connect to the Internet normally. 2. Install the distribution from the LXC mirror source or the tar.gz compressed package. 3. Wait for the installation to complete. 4. Click the "Open/Close" option to start or close the container. 5. Use SSH, VNC, XSDL, CLI, etc. to connect to the container.
